shots.comment: Are the other women nervous? They should be! But I’m not…
…I was in the room across from Green.
Sure, we ALL heard Peacock and Scarlet last night! They were loud…
“You’re jealous! You can’t stand the fact that Black invited me here!”
“Invited you?! You bullied Black into letting you stay!”
If I were you, I’d dig a little deeper into that little blow-up.
